## Bcp47.LanguageFilterOptions.use property

Indicates whether to return the matching language from the desired list or the available list. Default is `'availableLanguage'`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
use?: 'desiredLanguage' | 'availableLanguage';
```
